body.name: PAVOI 14K Gold Plated Solid 925 Sterling Silver Post Cubic Zirconia Stud Flat Back Earrings for Women | Cartilage Earring | Helix Piercing Jewelry | Small Stud Earrings for Women
features: These 2mm Round CZ Flat Back Earrings are Plated in 14K Rose Gold and are perfect to wear all day and all night! Please refer to instructional video for guidance.
These Small Stud Earrings are Crafted with Durable Pre-bent Steel Pins on the Stud Tops and 6mm long Solid 925 Sterling Silver Posts.

✦ 60-DAY GUARANTEE ✦ Your happiness is our number one priority. To ensure your complete satisfaction, we offer a hassle-free 60-Day money-back guarantee. To get in touch, email or chat with us - a member of our team will be happy to help you.

✦ SUSTAINABILITY ✦ PAVOI is dedicated to sustainability throughout our entire product cycle. Our jewelry is made from 100% recycled materials and we package in 99% recycled materials. We work to reduce our carbon emissions and offset plastic consumption by removing 275,000 bottles from oceans annually. We are committed to maintain a balanced and eco-friendly business that minimizes our environmental impact. Trust that PAVOI is continuously working towards a greener future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegance meets quality
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the PAVOI 14K Gold Plated Solid 925 Sterling Silver Post Cubic Zirconia Stud Earrings, and they have exceeded my expectations in both style and craftsmanship.The design strikes the perfect balance between classic, modern, and dainty, making these earrings versatile enough for both casual and formal occasions. The stones sparkle brilliantly and add a touch of sophistication to any outfit.The gold plating enhances the earrings' visual appeal, giving them a luxurious finish that complements the overall design. Despite the affordable price point, the quality is evident, and the earrings exude a sense of fine jewelry.The flat back design is not only stylish but also ensures a comfortable fit. I appreciate the attention to detail, from the secure post closures to the overall durability of the earrings.Having worn them for extended periods, I can attest to their comfort and how well they retain their luster. The PAVOI Stud Earrings have become a staple in my collection, offering a perfect blend of elegance, quality, and affordability. If you're in search of timeless stud earrings, these are a fantastic choice that won't disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for headscarf wearers
reviews.reviewText: I chose these earrings because headscarf use was causing discomfort, as the backs of earrings were pushed into my head. These are exactly what I wanted- neat, pretty and comfortable. I concur with previous reviews that your piecing needs to be wide enough to get them through. Insertion is a bit fiddly but nothing major. I'd definitely buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are a good size. I wouldn’t want them any bigger (3mm). They look great and are very comfortable. I can sleep in them. I’m happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Hard to close
reviews.reviewText: These are beautiful and once on, they stay on! The only reason I didn’t make it 5 stars is because it is hard to screw on the back piece. I don’t have arthritis or any hand issues, they’re just tough. I can get one side on easier than the other but it took some time. I tried adding a plastic back piece but earring is too short. On another note, I’m sensitive to earrings and jewelry, I get itchy or red and this pair does NOT do that to me. Overall I am happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars love this brand
reviews.reviewText: these are so tiny and perfect and the flat backs are so nice for being able to sleep in my jewelry. this brand is the only brand i will buy earrings from, they don’t tarnish and are such good quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered these and a pair of Huggies for my self after losing my long time studs .These are beautiful. Easy to screw on backs . They look high end. I do wish the posts were slightly longer. But so far I’m impressed.Wish this company had septum rings, so all my stuff could match.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As good as you can get outside of a nice piercing studio
reviews.reviewText: Pictured on my earlobes are the 2.5mm gold ball (2nd hole) and the 3mm cubic zirconia gold stud (first), both Pavoi.Great for the price. Holding up well, even in the shower. No irritation even for my super sensitive nickel-allergy skin. The back is flat but a somewhat thick disc compared to the ultra thin stainless surgical steel backs you get at a piercing studio. It works and doesn’t poke my head which is the main selling point, so does the job.My earlobes are chunky but these don’t squeeze them too tightly. Wish the post was slightly longer for more wiggle room but not a deal breaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Look great, but hard to get in.
reviews.reviewText: I like the way they look. I like that they are easy to sleep on. The problem is that they aren’t the easiest to put on. I can get normal earrings on easy least, but these are a little blunt and a little thicker. It was a bit of an ordeal for my left ear earrings.
Muy bonito y sin bronca exelente producto
